review: Setup was simple and chromecasting (mirrored stream) from Google Chrome browser worked well. Disappointed that Chromecasting was not available from mobile Chrome browsers.  That would have brought more functionality to the Chromecast to be more similar to Apple's Airplay and Apple TV. Overall, the experience was a good one.
author: D.K.Y.

review: Love the size and ease of use, it's just missing some kind of computer mirroring
author: Boloyde

review: Great product and great shipping experience
author: Shannon Foss

review: Works great, but do not be misled: you can't stream ANY tab from Chrome (only certain sites are Chromecast enabled). Somewhat disappointed in that fact, but still a great product and it did not give me a rash.
author: AJ

review: I really like my Chromecast. There are st.ill some beta tests going on with screencast from some of our different devices so I can only give it 4 stars. Once they get it worked out, it will be 5 stars hands down. It plays all my Google Play purchases flawlessly, set up is super easy and it works perfectly for our family. Highly recommend.
author: Todd C.
